snippet.title: Among Us 15 Player Lobbies ✨ Coming June 15, 2021
snippet.description:
Our 15 player update for Among Us is coming out on all our currently available platforms (PC, mobile, Nintendo Switch) on June 15th! With an all new kill menu, colors, and update art style, it's going to be chaos. As seen on the Xbox E3 Showcase. Coming to Xbox consoles later this year.

✨ Read more about the update here: https://innersloth.itch.io/among-us/devlog/261573/among-us-3rd-birthday-15-player-lobbies
✨ Get official Among Us merch: https://store.innersloth.com/

Among Us is a game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space! Play online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone.

------------------------------------------

🚀  LINKS  🚀

➫ Website: http://innersloth.com/
➫  YouTube: https://youtube.com/c/Innersloth
➫ Twitter: https://twitter.com/InnerslothDevs
➫ Among Us Twitter: https://twitter.com/AmongUsGame
➫ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Innersloth/
➫ Discord: discord.gg/innersloth
➫ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/innerslothdevs
➫ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@amongus

------------------------------------------

🚀 GAMES 🚀

➥ Among Us (iOS, Android, itch.io, Steam): http://innersloth.com/gameAmongUs.php
➥ The Henry Stickmin Collection: http://innersloth.com/gameHenryCollec...
➥ Dig 2 China: http://innersloth.com/gameDig2China.php

-----------------------------------------
